You have to continue to do what you are doing , if you are certain you are doing the right thing .
Self esteem and self confidence are the key stones to success and happiness .
Here are some steps you must follow and internalize if you wish to raise your self worth and confidence level .

item.s: Stop comparing yourself with other people , Say and think good about yourself .
Everyone makes mistakes , but it is how you react to them that makes a difference .
Do n't beat yourself up over a slip up ; forgive yourself , laugh it off , and learn from it .

figure.rend: Appreciate the Uniqueness in You Step 2.jpg

item.s: Associate with similar people .
It is said that you are that he average of five of your closest friends .
Try to surround yourself only with positive people who reflect your values and that you can learn from .
Keep people near you who will encourage , motivate , and accept you as you are .
Do not keep " vanity friends .
" Those are the people who pose as your friends but pull you down at the earliest opportunity .
Having them may make you seen popular , but they are useless as actual friends .

figure.rend: Appreciate the Uniqueness in You Step 3.jpg

item.s: Make a list of your positive qualities .
It 's okay to start with a few and add more each day .
List out what you love about yourself and the qualities you want to have ; work towards fostering those qualities every day .
You could also write down your short-term to help motivate you to reach them

figure.rend: Appreciate the Uniqueness in You Step 4.jpg

item.s: Start doing some exercise every day .
By doing this , you will feel better .
Exercising releases endorphins which will lessen your stress .
By exercising , your helping your body keep your hormones and feelings at the appropriate level .

figure.rend: Appreciate the Uniqueness in You Step 5.jpg

item.s: Help others reach your level .
Yes , you are unique , and that deserves appreciation .
Other people are unique and need appreciation as well .
They may not think they deserve it or may not know how to accept themselves .
Help them by building them up as you do yourself .
Be generous with compliments .
Thank others when they help you , and give them credit when they deserve it .

figure.rend: Appreciate the Uniqueness in You Step 1.jpg

item.s: Praise yourself but not at the expense of others .
Instead of putting people down to make you seem better , praise everyone 's achievements with your own .
When the team wins , you do n't say " I did it .
" Instead , you say " we did it .
" By praising everyone ( while including yourself ) , you help everyone and create a personal , friendly bond with them .
Sometimes , just smiling at someone can give their self-esteem a boost .
Do not confuse high self esteem and confidence with arrogance and ego .
While the former makes people happy and lets them believe they are good as anyone else , the second makes them believe they , and only they , are the best .
